name: Donald Trumpet
description:
Use a trumpet to blow Donald's hair around his face while he isn't looking!

Try to beat your high score and challenge friends in this highly addictive game!

There are two modes - Classic Mode and Game Mode. Spend hours blowing Donald's hair in Classic Mode without any repercussion, but if you click that button in the bottom left hand corner of the screen to change to Game Mode... then watch out! Because if you're still blowing Donald's Hair and he opens his eyes then YOU'RE FIRED!

See who can get the best high score!
